name: GiancArtboard
description: Export all artboards numbered and perfectly organized into folders. No more inaccuracies!
author: Matteo Vacca

commands.name: Run GiancArtboard
commands.description: Export all artboards numbered and perfectly organized into folders. No more inaccuracies!

commands.name: Check incorrect artboards
commands.description: Check if there are any artboard with a different width from the one you are designing. No more inaccuracies!
